intro.title: Finance × Blockchain × AI Explorer
intro.description: I am interested in how market microstructure, network structures, and their topological features influence price dynamics, liquidity, and trading efficiency in secondary and decentralized financial markets. My current research applies graph theory, network topology, convex optimization, stochastic processes, and tools from real analysis to design high-frequency trading and market-making strategies

meet.title: I'm excited to meet people who

items.mbti: Are ENTJ / ENFP / INTJ / ISTJ types
